title: cmd/go: some "go help" output is longer than 80 columns
body:
The help of the various Go subtools is mostly formatted to fit into 80 columns already. But there are a few exceptions, which makes the help messages hard to read.

A patch is forthcoming which reformats these. I think it would be nice to get this into go1.5 if possible.

PS: I know there's no expectation that Go code is always inside of 80 columns. But I think it would be a good idea for the output of "go help XXX" to fit inside normal sized windows.
